definition: constituting or living in the open sea
details:
adjective
- constituting or living in the open sea
= example: constituting or living in the open sea
- resembling the ocean in apparent limitlessness in extent or degree
= example: resembling the ocean in apparent limitlessness in extent or degree
- relating to or occurring or living in or frequenting the open ocean
= example: relating to or occurring or living in or frequenting the open ocean
= synonyms: pelagic
